website_summaries.verdict: Get relief from heartburn that occurs more than twice a week with this affordable option consisting of three weeks' worth of treatment.
pros: Top-selling alternative to Prilosec OTC, this PPI treats the same symptoms and is easy on the wallet
Even though delayed release, many users find they feel better faster than the 1-4 days it potentially takes to become effective
cons: Opening the blister packs can be challenging
Shouldn't be taken more than 14 days without consulting a doctor

customer_reviews.title: They increased their price over 100% since March 2020
customer_reviews.text: This product helped reduce my symptoms and I feel great! I went to re order and they increased the price by over 100% since March of 2020. This was a big disappointment and now I will be ordering another brandand NOT GoodSense brand. I do not know the reason for this increase but I am assuming it's due to Covid-19 and they are price gouging!! What a shame. At this time when people aren't working and do not have money coming in, they should be, at a minimum, keeping prices as is to help people get through this difficult time. The Perrigo Company should be ashamed of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Huge price jump!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years, works great, but the price just jump by 50-60%, now more expensive than name brand. Will not purchase again until they lower it back.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mariana

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: These do the job when my acid reflux kicks in. Within a couple hours of taking one, my stomach has settled down. I can’t say the same for the no-name “generic” omeprazole from Mexico that is available from Amazon at a much lower price. After an unsatisfactory experience with that product, I consider my money better spent on this pricier but more consistent version. And when you’re dealing with reflux, you’re ready to pay whatever the cost of getting over it.
customer_reviews.author: John Techwriter

customer_reviews.title: Generic Prilosec
customer_reviews.text: I am a pharmacist, so I might be slightly biased. My opinion is that these generic Prilosec tablets are excellent. The price is better than you will find in most stores and on line. Note that these are tablets , not capsules. Some people prefer tablets and some prefer capsules. They are the same either way.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as the brand name medication for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed a 30 day course of 40 mg of omeprazole daily. I don't have prescription drug insurance and it would cost me $67 out of pocket. My pharmacist suggested taking 2 x 20 mg pills of generic. There are certain people who take omeprazole every day for years. Be very careful, since there are side effects. My doctor told me that chronic use of this drug can cause kidney damage (including kidney stones). A 30 day course should be sufficient for your esophagus to hear from acid damage.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: These changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a problem since about high school, where I'd bite the inside of my mouth, or scrape it with a tortilla chip or some Cap'n Crunch, and it would just take FOREVER to heal. I took L-Lysine for years, since it actually seems to help the healing process, but when I take these, there ARE no mouth bites that last longer than a few hours. I take 1 every 3 days, and if I get a scrape or a cut in my mouth, I increase to one daily until it's gone. I have to order 2-3 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: alfa

customer_reviews.title: Usually Goodsense products work for me - not this one.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Rx'd Prilosec 20 MG (capsule) and they work great. These did nothing. Nothing. I took as directed and when I did later eat, I was in immediate and severe pain.
customer_reviews.author: Avowed Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work that well. I need a Pepcid by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy generic omeprazole (including cheap Ebay omeprazole from India) and believe the effectiveness really does vary. Some of the Indian stuff works OK but my favorite generic brand by far is Equate, which is available at the smiley face place. I thought I'd try this product by GoodSense but rather than feeling heartburn immune, as I do with the Equate, I find I either have to take two or top off with a Pepcid.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: As Good as Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: As a user of Prilosec OTC, I need these pills to help with massive bouts of acid reflux, especially at night. After purchasing Prilosec for almost a year, I wanted to see if there was a less expensive alternative to Prilosec and I have found it. This product works just as good as Prilosec while saving quite a considerable amount of money. The cost of these pills was roughly half the price of Prilosec. If you've been taking Prilosec or looking to take Prilosec, I do suggest that you purchase these instead. These are identical in effectiveness while significantly cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Wathan48

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work!
customer_reviews.text: This generic brand did not work at all for me. I am recovering from gastritis and symptoms began to come back after using this product. I even had one episode of acid reflux. I have started back on Prilosec and my stomach is feeling much better. Will not repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Kai

customer_reviews.title: Does work very wrll.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lil longer to work than it use to. But it's great for this purchase value. My order had 42 tab in it. I state that because I've seen other review on other products not match up the volume of the product I was currently looking at.
customer_reviews.author: gina K graves

customer_reviews.title: Extremely overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for a couple years now. In the past few months, prices have increased dramatically. What was ~$15.99 is now over $30. Stay away. stay far away, seems like GoodSense may now be owned by Martin Shkreli.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: An awful but needed stomach medication with terrible drug interactions and side effects eventually!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very dangerous, and big pharma knows it. But what else is there, the other stomach pill that can give you cancer over time? People with GERD like me are stuck with this evil drug. I am stuck using this drug and I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: freebella

customer_reviews.title: FRUSTRATING PACKAGING!
customer_reviews.text: WHY do you spend so much money packaging these pills in such a way that elderly people, with weak, arthritic hands, have to use scissors to open them? I've invested WAY too much time and will look for a different option next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jayni Mosher

customer_reviews.title: So relieved!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from extreme acid reflux. So bad, that I will wake up in the middle of the night throwing up stomach acid and it will feel like my throat is being held under fire. I started taking these 4 days ago. It took 2 days to work but after that, I am totally acid reflux free day and night and I am extremely happy! Highly recommend. I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Josy

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well and priced right!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently been diagnosed with acid reflux. In addition to daily ranitidine (generic for Zantac), my doctor prescribed a six-week course of omeprazole (generic for Prilosec) to heal any existing damage. I just finished the omeprazole and it seems to have worked. My bedtime coughing has lessened considerably and I no longer cough during the night while sleeping. Also, the price was much better here than in my local drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: BlueMist828

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: My heartburn was so bad that I eventually had to have it surgically corrected. Before the surgery, these pills were the only thing that helped and got me to sleep comfortably through the night. Chewables like Tums would only take the edge off of the pain, but these knocked it out completely. I absolutely recommend them if you have bad heartburn, plus the price here is WAY better than the name brand stuff they sell at the pharmacy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: No flavor. I buy the regular ones on purpose. I don't like the artificial ones, they taste funny. I've been taking these for years, for acid indigestion and other reasons. Only recently found out about the Good Sense brand. Pretty happy too they came a week earlier than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Major acid reflux and heartburn guy here...this stuff WORKS BETTER THAN ANYTHING!! I've tried all the big brands and before this, Nexium was the best. This stuff is WAY better. I take 2 a day EVERYDAY and feel great. However, PUT IT IN A BOTTLE!!! Takes way to long to open up and $$ wasted on packing and paper.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Helped my bad breath
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this regularly in hopes it would help my breath. (I have tried toothpastes, mouthwashes, probiotics, etc. and nothing was working -- the breath issue seemed to be from my gut!) After about a week of daily use, my breath improved. It's been a month or so and almost no complaints about my breath from my significant other.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Prilosec
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to save a little money from buying name brand, this is the way to go. The pill looks similar to Prilosec and it does the job. It has the ingredients you need. I actually prefer this off-brand since its cheaper and pretty much the same as the name-brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Was vomiting and choking almost daily every morning. My doctor recommended this OTC. I took as prescribed for the full 14 days. Haven't vomited since. Still have the additional two packs unopened and ready! Used many things prior for reflux, none have had results like this.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended. Not much else to say! No more heartburn is a good thing and these are cheaper than the store bought omeprazole. I would recommend without hesitation to those looking to save some money on their weekly medications.
customer_reviews.author: Ross B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It's great. I was using Dexalin for over 2 years ...
customer_reviews.text: This is working for me. It's great. I was using Dexalin for over 2 years now and the cost was horrible even with a coupon and now my insurance will only cover 150.00 towards the cost... my monthly cost was going to be over a hundred dollars a month... not going to happen.... Try this, its working amazing, not problems at all..
customer_reviews.author: Juletta davidson

customer_reviews.title: Pills are in individual compartments
customer_reviews.text: The tablets are fine and work as they should. I will not get them again because each tablet has to be snapped out of a pack for use. I prefer tablets in a bottle since I put a weeks worth of various pills in a container for daily dispensing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, not easy to open
customer_reviews.text: The tablets are in heavy duty foil bubble packaging. You'll need to push the foil side with some strength to release the pill though the paper side. You can also use scissors to cut them open. Either way the packaging is recyclable where I live.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These worked for me as well as the brand name Prilosec. The quality was awesome & the price even better.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Same generic as Costco
customer_reviews.text: Same generic product as Costco’s brand. Great price. When I purchased them, they were a little less than Costco sale price, but prices are coming down, so will buy again if priced better than Costco. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe - Everett, WA

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Better price than my local big box store. I think they take a few days to really start working, in my opinion. But these are certainly as good as the non-generic brand.
customer_reviews.author: James Butler

customer_reviews.title: good value for money and good product to keep in ...
customer_reviews.text: been using these for some years.as a diver sometimes get a bit of acid after eating spicy food or tomatoes.......these tablets stop it quickly maybe after 6-12 hours. one tablet usually does the trick. good value for money and good product to keep in the first aid kit. this is not like those chalky tablets which do not work...this is a proper product that stops the acid.
customer_reviews.author: David Tunnicliff

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me at all - felt like I wasn’t taking one. I usually use the name brand, but decided to give this a try. I had to go back to the name brand product. I know meds all work differently for different people, so maybe it would work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Mmandkcs

customer_reviews.title: delighted with quality
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it is supposed to do. The med works. It is in blister packaging, but I am able to use a fingernail or a slightly pointed object to make a hole in the wrapper. This is very easy to do, and the pill is not damaged. These pills work great, I am not having a problem with them being generic. I had to purchase these when I dumped an entire brand new bottle of pills on the street. Literally in the dirt and mud. There was no way I was paying the pharmacy the price they wanted for generics. I came to Amazon to find a generic version which was 1/3 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: It’s been a week and still no relief!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally purchased these instead of Esomeprazole but decided to take them anyway because I have had some success with Nexium in the past. It’s been about a week now and my heartburn is returning full force. I even double up on these yesterday and still barely any relief. I’ll never make that mistake again!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Received smaller package size than described.
customer_reviews.text: Listing states package count of 45 tablets. Received a package of 14 tablets
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: You can’t return if it doesn’t work for you. :(
customer_reviews.text: Took this hoping to temporarily replace my ranitidine. I don’t recommend. My first day on it and I’m retaining water really badly, and my BP is up. Tried to return but apparently no returns are allowed? I’m going to give the generic of Pepcid a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff France

customer_reviews.title: Goodsense Omeprazole
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I can get this here, the value is awesome! I've had to take this product for years and my insurance won't cover the perscription version anymore and over the counter pricing is outrageous!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri M Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Blister pack!
customer_reviews.text: Yikes, these blister packs are tough. We are sitting here and cutting them all open at once and putting them in a jar. Just be aware of the packaging. I missed that..
customer_reviews.author: Grampy of the North

customer_reviews.title: Product has an Expiration date that expired 7 months ago.
customer_reviews.text: All three boxes inside as well as the outer box had the same EXPIRED expiration date: (received 4-24-2020 and EXPIRATION DATE 10/19) I really need this medication and could not return it and wait for a new more current package. I subscribed to receive this every 5 weeks.VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm absolutely in love with eating Carolina reapers
customer_reviews.text: These have been a godsend. I'm absolutely in love with eating Carolina reapers, ghost, habs, scorpion and Thai peppers. I also have a love affair with beer. The problem is that I'm getting old and the frequent consumption of both anihilates my stomach and gives me the worst acid reflux. My sister recommended two of these a day and it has all but eliminated my problem!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Michael Wolschon

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of the problem, lots for the $$ you spend. Worked just as good as other name brands
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used these since they came out and have never had an issue. I eat anything thats put in front of me (except eggplant and beets) and no heartburn.
customer_reviews.author: Civ

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the product
customer_reviews.text: If I were to buy an acid re-flux pill normally the cost would be too much for how often I have acid re-flux. So, the packaging is odd..... I usually just take the pills out of the shells and put in a normal pill bottle for the flare ups. Worth the cost savings. Effective for my re-flux. Highly recommend! Cost savings for buying in bulk generic!
customer_reviews.author: Digitalgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lousy delivery
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years, and it works for me. What doesn't work for me is the guy who delivered it propping it up against my garage door instead of bringing it to the door. I don't live in my garage. I took off one star for the delivery method.
customer_reviews.author: AuBadge

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I got off to a bad start with omeprozole by taking this product-- this brand of didn't help me at all. Waste of money. Luckily, i persevered and experienced another generic brand of the same drug--amazing difference!. And the price was the same.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good generic!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for two weeks now, replacing Prilosac. I grew up with Pharmacist parents (I know, I grew up HARD) so one of their biggest life lessons (half kidding) was to always buy generic drugs. I had tried Walgreens generic version in the past, and it was noticeably less effective in my experience than Prilosac. Goodsense brand has been great though, and I will continue to buy it. Its a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Package delivery
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but they said it was handed to me Not true it was left on my front porch in a Secure płace but dont lie and say it was handed to me
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: As good as prescription!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as a supplement to my prescribed omeprazole. The prices are comparable (with insurance), and the effect is the same, with a slightly smaller dose. Pros: 1. Comparable price to prescription with insurance. 2. Works as well/same as script! Cons: 1. Not cheaper than the prescription still! Recommend overall!
customer_reviews.author: Ariss McKalynn

customer_reviews.title: Extended use will lead to kidney damage.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but do not use it for more than 12 or 28 days. Even if there is still a physician today who would you that long-term use is okay, it isn't. I know. Also, Johns Hopkins issued a study a number of years ago showing a link with kidney damage.
customer_reviews.author: JaySL

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the generic version
customer_reviews.text: I like saving money and this is a great price instead of paying for the brand names at local pharmacies
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the prescription
customer_reviews.text: For some reason these work better than the doctor's prescription I got I won't be going back to him I'll be purchasing these again
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A definite life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from acid reflux on a daily basis. Omeprazole is the only effective solution that last me all day and night. I have the biggest time with acid reflux at night when I go to bed. As long as I take 1 pill in the morning it'll last me until the next morning. Otherwise, if I skip a day it's all heck to pay and I'm up all night feeling sick and having to sit up at night. This is a true life saver and makes life comfortable again. Please let me know if this review was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: B Town

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as a capsule for me.
customer_reviews.text: Having taken omeprazole for 20 years, I found these tablets were not as effective as the capsules. I tried taking them at several different times only to have my acid reflux flare up while using the tablets. My friends had concerns with them being produced overseas, but that was not a concern for me.
customer_reviews.author: feedbackFriend

customer_reviews.title: Works for my wife's constant acid reflux.
customer_reviews.text: These have noticeably improved my wife's consistent acid reflux and they were recommended to her by our GP doctor. If you have acid reflux, consult your doctor if they think you should try Omeprazole. It's an over-the-counter drug, so you could simply try it yourself if you like. Just know that it's mostly for consistent reflux sufferers and to follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: my mother couldn't open them
customer_reviews.text: blister pack insufferable. My mom gave up and just took tums. OK, it's kid safe,..apparently it's also senior safe.
customer_reviews.author: Nath

customer_reviews.title: 33% less $ for 100% GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor, isnt that hilarious! 33% less costly than name brands, and dose my chronic heartburn like a five star champ!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Work very well. I take a lot of medication and use this at night to help my stomach. Works like a dream. I'm sorry without it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Perez

customer_reviews.title: Decent replacement
customer_reviews.text: If your looking to save money and get an off brand this one is pretty good. It helps with the heartburn. I just wish it was a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Always het the Omeprazole in the bottles !! Easy then to have to pop out each pill , big pain & it’s the same $$
customer_reviews.author: Molly Matus

customer_reviews.title: Product not returnable! Not Esomeprazole!
customer_reviews.text: Not returnable beware! I bought this by mistake I wanted Esomeprazole I had put in the search for Esomeprazole and I didn’t notice the name was different. They are unopened
customer_reviews.author: Paula H.

customer_reviews.title: Heartburn free since the FIRST pill
customer_reviews.text: My life has changed! I have finished the 14th pill....so now I wait 4 months and see if I need it again. I wish I tried these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni M

customer_reviews.title: No fire, no kidding
customer_reviews.text: Past a certain age + weight (and maybe well before) you may have much more stomach acid than you need. Best case (heartburn) - worst case (esophageal erosion). One of life's little miseries. If you are a big fan of brand-name anything, pay the premium for Nexium (TM). If not, use omeprazole and always be able to look a pepperoni and anchovy pizza in the eye without flinching. Same price as my local pharmacy and no sales tax + Prime shipping. Whats not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Sperrier

customer_reviews.title: Omeprazole Acid Reducer
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with indigestion since my gall bladder surgery. Know I shouldn't but didn't have indigestion till one day and had surgery within 20 hours with a total block. Taking one a day in the morning I don't have indigestion and highly recommend Omeprazole to anyone who suffers. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as the name brand and at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.text: With all of the generic brands of Omeprazole out there now, I'm not sure why the cost hasn't come down yet. I'm always on the hunt for a bargain when it comes to this medicine. Good Sense brand works just as well as the name brand and at a fraction of the price. Anyone who is convinced that they have to pay full price for the name brand us wrong. I will continue to come back to Amazon to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, good value for money, working after half an hour. I feel more comfort ,easy to swollow, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kloudia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go generic on this one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Prilosec for quite a long time which has been a life saver. I tried several weeks to switch to this, but my stomach just wouldn’t agree with it. I try to give generics a try, but this one doesn’t cut it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It takes 2 doses before it works
customer_reviews.text: If you take this for heartburn issues at night it works great. Just takes 2 days to bvb kick in.
customer_reviews.author: buck wylde

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as prescription!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to my insurance company for not allowing me to refill my Prilosec for 3 months (!!!) I decided to try this instead. I had gone without my scrip for 3 days and was miserable. I was without from a Friday to Sunday, started this on Monday, and by Wednesday was feeling back to normal again. The scrip was the same at first, there wasn't instant relief, but within a day or two it was much better. Now, I can tell the insurance company to bite it. :)
customer_reviews.author: CarrieLou

customer_reviews.title: Priced increase made the value for it decreases
customer_reviews.text: I subscribe but the priced increased and made it more expensive than its worth. I can get it cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this stuff for years I decided to try some from amazon I am glad I did. Work the same as my prescription and a lot cheaper
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Worked Amazingly!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about it at first since its not the actual Prilosec. But i'm so glad I did. Didn't have one bit of an issue, and i used to get severe heartburn after everything i ate. Definitely give this a try, its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: James Hargis

customer_reviews.title: the subscribe and save feature
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the feature of the subscribe and save. It saved a little off the price
customer_reviews.author: lynn buri

customer_reviews.title: blister pack - difficult and cumbersome to remove them
customer_reviews.text: about the same price as generic's at kroger / dillons, but these are individually wrapped in blister packs. If you take one each day you have to remove each one individually, and they are prone to "popping out" and go flying somewhere, or don't land in your hand, etc
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: A good value.
customer_reviews.text: Not always easy to find in my rural area. Nice to find this good value thru Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carla H

customer_reviews.title: Just say no to frequent heartburn
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and in good working order. It was a good value for the money at time of purchase as well. I use this medication daily and have for years due to having a very acidic stomach. It works just as well as the name brand Prilosec at a fraction of the cost. It also lasts for years so stock up if you are a frequent user. The packaging is solid and is high quality. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: The have worked just as well and I am very happy about my savings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to save a little money from similar over the counter heartburn relief pills. The have worked just as well and I am very happy about my savings. They come in a blister pack individually packaged so that is nice to be able to take with me on travel, which I do a lot of. Instead of having a ton of pill bottles to cart around and if I accidentally leave them behind it's not the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product that works for an OTC generic brand.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than buying this as a name-brand at the store! Works great and I would recommend it if you have chronic acid reflux problems. They are not a miracle 1-hour cure though. Remember to take it as your doctor says. You need to take this around the same time every day, for a long duration of time and you will ultimately see results. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Yale

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work. Sugar Pill?
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time but I swear this one was a placebo pack. I had crippling acid reflux until I switched to another generic Omeprazole and my problem went away immediately. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pills came in separate package
customer_reviews.text: I ordered generic pills. They were listed as being mailed together with another item. Only the other product was inside. I am having difficulty in trying to contact someone for a refund or reshipping product. This is an expensive issue as I ordered two boxes. UPDATE: Pills came in separate package! Great pills. I will order pills from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Cannot figure out how to stop the automatic re-send!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot figure out how to stop the automatic re-send!! Nothing wrong with the product but I don’t want it delivered on a regular basis and I can’t figure out how to stop it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy squires

customer_reviews.title: Useable
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not feel excellent but as it was okay. Not for chronic patient I guess
customer_reviews.author: sayma binte hasan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works as good as the name brand Prilosec. I can't tell the difference in it's effectiveness. It works very well for me - I take one and I don't have heartburn for several days up to a week - at all. Whenever I get heartburn, I cough, so I don't like to get it at all. The Goodsense brand is now my go-to generic brand. All their products work great - I've tried a ton of them and they have consistent quality and good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Bugs

customer_reviews.title: Great value pills
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great brand. I was very happy to receive this items on time.
customer_reviews.author: Agha Khan

customer_reviews.title: Best Generic
customer_reviews.text: Best price on Generic Omeprazole I've seen. Fast shipping, next-day...what's not to like? :)
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: ... dish out 20-30 bucks for the brand name items like Prilosec. Saw this and thought it was too ...
customer_reviews.text: Constant reflux problems here and I used to dish out 20-30 bucks for the brand name items like Prilosec. Saw this and thought it was too good to be true but I have been using it for a little bit now and it is perfect. Save yourself money and get this instead of the brand names, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I started getting the Good Sense brand from Amazon because it's cheaper and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Since our insurance stopped covering my husbands omeprazole we have to buy it at the store and it's a lot more expensive over the counter. I started getting the Good Sense brand from Amazon because it's cheaper and it turns out it works just as well as the prescription. I will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Acid Relief at a discount
customer_reviews.text: This is the same ingredient as Prilosec just in discount form. I'd been suffering with some extra acid reflux due to stress and was suggested by my doctor to take this for a while so it was nice to find it in a more affordable form. The effects take a couple of days to take initial effect but I felt relief after 2 days. The only annoyance I'd have is I wish they weren't in the blister pack, it's one of the few daily long term medicines I know that's not in an easy open bottle.
customer_reviews.author: William B Partridge

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that prevents heartburn and keeps it away
customer_reviews.text: Omeprazole is the only prescription that stops, well rather prevents, my heartburn from acid reflux/hiatal hernia. I say prevent because you have to take it regularly, before heartburn kicks in. Personally, I take this in the morning before food.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Might work for some, but doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it works well for other people, but I'm working with a giant ulcer that requires constant attention. The only thing that seems to work is Prilosec. I have tried this numerous times because the price is right. It just doesn't work for me. It literally feels like I'm taking nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Omeprazole
customer_reviews.text: Spicy foods or occasional bad digestion might give temporary relief.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell and texture
customer_reviews.text: This is another product that should have a tamper proof seal. I do not trust it.

customer_reviews.title: It was like taking nothing at all
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero I would. It was like taking nothing at all. Very disappointed!

customer_reviews.text: This works just as good as the name brand. But, it recently doubled in price. You can purchase the name brand for $10 less.

customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped fast and these work very well. Would buy again!

customer_reviews.text: Tried all the fancy name brand meds. This is the only one that worked for my heartburn.

customer_reviews.text: This product is like the one in the store. Does what it should for a better price!

customer_reviews.title: Ok For Some
customer_reviews.text: I docked a star because after a 14-day treatment I still deal with indigestion.

customer_reviews.title: I realized this was cheaper than even some other off brands and he says it seems to work better. more like the name brand
customer_reviews.text: hubby uses this in place of the name brand and it really works well. he has a hiatal hernia and really need something that works so it's important we have something dependable. I realized this was cheaper than even some other off brands and he says it seems to work better. more like the name brand. he is happy with it and we will be buying this again!

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I get acid reflux real bad and this always helps. Bought it few times before and will buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Will buy generic again.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was reluctant to try a generic brand but they have transitioned smooth into stopping the much more expensive OTC Prilosec. Will buy again, easy to order, delivered promptly.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one's you buy at the Grocery Store except ...
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one's you buy at the Grocery Store except "THESE ARE LESS EXPENSIVE" Great product for Acid Reflux. Take one in the morning every other day and you will never have to much or to less. I take it Mon. Wed. Fri. & Sat. Repeat. Works for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GoodSense Omeprazole Delayed Release Tablets 20 mg, Acid Reducer, Treats Heartburn, 42 Count
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Active Ingredient (In Each Tablet): omeprazole 20 mg, acid reducer. Inactive Ingredients: carnauba wax, ferric oxide red, ferric oxide yellow, hypromellose, hypromellose acetate succinate, lactose monohydrate, monoethanolamine, propylene glycol, sodium lauryl sulfate, sodium starch glycolate, sodium stearate, sodium stearyl fumarate, talc, titanium dioxide, triethyl citrate.
feature_bullets: Effective: Compare GoodSense Omeprazole Delayed Release Tablets 20 mg to Prilosec OTC. The active ingredient in these delayed release tablets is Omeprazole 20 mg. It works as an acid reducer to treat frequent heartburn.
Treats Frequent Heartburn: These Acid Reducer Pills Treat Frequent Heartburn That Occurs 2 or More Times a Week.
Acid Reducer: Omeprazole 20 Mg Is a Proton Pump Inhibitor (Ppi) That Deactivates Pumps in the Stomach Lining to Inhibit Acid Production at the Source.

14-Day Course of Heartburn Treatment: Taken Once Every 24 Hours for 14 Days, Omeprazole Delayed Release Tablets 20 Mg Is Not Intended for Immediate Relief of Heartburn and May Take 1 to 4 Days for Full Effect.

Tips for Managing Heartburn: Do Not Lie Flat or Bend Over Soon After Eating. Do Not Eat Late at Night or Just Before Bedtime. Certain Foods or Drinks Are More Likely to Cause Heartburn, Such As Rich, Spicy, Fatty and Fried Foods.
